title: Untilled (Liegender Frauenakt)
medium: Concrete with beehive structure, wax, and live bee colony
dimensions: Figure 29 1/2 x 57 1/16 x 17 11/16" (75 x 145 x 45 cm), base 11 13/16 x 57 1/16 x 21 5/8" (30 x 145 x 55 cm), beehive dimensions variable
